content: behind prev rnds round 12 working in front of round 11 join d with slip_stitch to the first unworked single_crochet on round 8 after any trcl-corner begpc in same st chain 8 skip next 5 double_crochet of round 11 popcorn in next unworked single_crochet on round 8 chain 5 behind trefoil slip_stitch in chain-3 space behind trefoil chain 5 working in front of round 11 - popcorn in next unworked single_crochet on round 8 after trefoil around omitting last popcorn join with slip_stitch to top of begpc finish off the chain-5 lps are placed behind trcl-corners and the chain-8 lps lay atop round 11 double_crochet 8 popcorn 8 chain-5 4 chain-8 4 slip_stitch round 13 note work over enclose both corner chain-lps it is optional to work over enclose the side chain-7 lps i did not because my color bled through use your own aesthetic judgement 5 © 2024 melinda miller all rights reserved moonstone rose afghan square round 13 working over both chain-lps join b with slip_stitch to any corner chain-space chain 3 count as double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same space half_double_crochet in next bpsc single_crochet in next 3 bpsc half_double_crochet in next bpsc fphdc around top of next popcorn working in front of chain-8 lp half_double_crochet in next 7 double_crochet fphdc around top of next popcorn half_double_crochet in next bpsc single_crochet in next 3 bpsc half_double_crochet in next bpsc 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next corner space working over both lps around omitting last 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in beg corner chain-lp to complete first corner join with double_crochet to top of beg chain-3 per side 6 double_crochet 11 half_double_crochet 2 fphdc 6 single_crochet 25 sts per side round 14 cont with b half_double_crochet into same corner space as follows yo insert hk first into chain-4 lp of trefoil and then into chain-2 space yo and pull up a lp yo and draw through all 3 lps single_crochet in same chain-2 space only single_crochet in next 25 sts single_crochet in next corner chain-2 space half_double_crochet by inserting hk first into chain-4 lp of trefoil and then into corner chain-2 space single_crochet in chain-2 space only around omitting last half_double_crochet and single_crochet join with slip_stitch to beg half_double_crochet finish off 4 half_double_crochet for corners 27 single_crochet per side round 15 join c with slip_stitch to any corner half_double_crochet chain 1 doesn t count as a st half_double_crochet single_crochet in same st single_crochet in next 27 sts single_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in corner half_double_crochet around omitting last single_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet in beg half_double_crochet corner st to complete first corner join with slip_stitch to top of beg half_double_crochet finish off 4 half_double_crochet for corners 29 single_crochet per side round 16 join e with slip_stitch to any corner half_double_crochet chain 3 count as double_crochet skip next 2 sts 3 double_crochet in next st to next corner half_double_crochet v-st in corner half_double_crochet around omitting last v-st double_crochet in beg half_double_crochet to complete first corner join with double_crochet
